ROOT.GetLines: SELECT DEV_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE WHERE ID={0} AND OBJ_TYPE='线路'
ROOT.GetList1: select id,dmname,pg_id,MEMBER_COUNT,DEV_ID,case when acname is not null then acname when dcname is not null then dcname else transname end as devname,OBJ_TYPE from ( select a.id,A.NAME AS DMNAME,PG_ID,MEMBER_COUNT,B.DEV_ID,OBJ_TYPE ,c.name as acname,d.name as dcname,e.name as transname FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SECTION_B A JOIN (select distinct * from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE) B ON A.ID=B.ID left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b c on b.dev_id=c.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b d on b.dev_id=d.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_pwrtransfm_b e on b.dev_id=e.id ) q WHERE PG_ID={0}
ROOT.GetList: select s.id,s.name,s.pg_id,s.MEMBER_COUNT,r.obj_type,r.dev_id,l.name,l.grid_id,r.dev_id as linest from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SECTION_B s JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE r ON s.ID=r.ID AND r.obj_type='线路' JOIN ( SELECT ID,NAME,GRID_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B UNION ALL SELECT ID,NAME,GRID_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B ) l ON r.dev_id=l.id WHERE s.pg_id={0} UNION ALL SELECT s.id,s.name,s.pg_id,s.MEMBER_COUNT,r.obj_type,r.dev_id,st.name||t.name,st.connective_pg_id,t.st_id as linest FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SECTION_B s JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE r ON s.ID=r.ID AND r.obj_type='变压器' JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_pwrtransfm_b t ON r.dev_id=t.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_COMMONSUBSTATION_B st ON t.st_id=st.id WHERE s.pg_id={0}
ROOT.GetSectionList: select s.id,s.name,s.pg_id,yg.create_time,yg.v00 as value,sx.v00 as ulimit,xx.v00 as dlimit,r.dev_id,r.name,r.st_id,r.ratio from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_b s left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SECTION_REALTIME_MEA yg on s.id=yg.section_id and yg.meas_type='00002001' left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SECTION_REALTIME_MEA sx on s.id=sx.section_id and sx.meas_type='00002020' and yg.create_time=sx.create_time left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SECTION_REALTIME_MEA xx on s.id=xx.section_id and xx.meas_type='00002021' and yg.create_time=xx.create_time LEFT JOIN ( SELECT R.ID,R.DEV_ID,D.NAME,'' AS ST_ID,R.RATIO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_B D ON R.DEV_ID=D.ID UNION ALL SELECT R.ID,R.DEV_ID,D.NAME,'' AS ST_ID,R.RATIO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINE_B D ON R.DEV_ID=D.ID UNION ALL SELECT R.ID,R.DEV_ID,D.NAME,D.ST_ID,R.RATIO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_pwrtransfm_b D ON R.DEV_ID=D.ID UNION ALL SELECT R.ID,R.DEV_ID,D.NAME,D.ST_ID,R.RATIO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_GENERATOR_B D ON R.DEV_ID=D.ID UNION ALL SELECT R.ID,R.DEV_ID,D.NAME,D.ST_ID,R.RATIO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_CONVERTER_B D ON R.DEV_ID=D.ID ) r ON s.id=r.id WHERE s.id NOT IN ('04019901000018','04019901000017') /* where s.pg_id={0} or s.pg_id in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0} )*/
ROOT.GetSectionMembersList: select s.id,s.name,s.pg_id,yg.create_time,yg.v00 as value,sx.v00 as ulimit,xx.v00 as dlimit,r.dev_id,r.name,r.st_id,r.ratio from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_b s left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SECTION_REALTIME_MEA yg on s.id=yg.section_id and yg.meas_type='00002001' left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SECTION_REALTIME_MEA sx on s.id=sx.section_id and sx.meas_type='00002020' and yg.create_time=sx.create_time left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SECTION_REALTIME_MEA xx on s.id=xx.section_id and xx.meas_type='00002021' and yg.create_time=xx.create_time LEFT JOIN ( SELECT R.ID,R.DEV_ID,D.NAME,'' AS ST_ID,R.RATIO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_B D ON R.DEV_ID=D.ID UNION ALL SELECT R.ID,R.DEV_ID,D.NAME,'' AS ST_ID,R.RATIO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINE_B D ON R.DEV_ID=D.ID UNION ALL SELECT R.ID,R.DEV_ID,D.NAME,D.ST_ID,R.RATIO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_pwrtransfm_b D ON R.DEV_ID=D.ID UNION ALL SELECT R.ID,R.DEV_ID,D.NAME,D.ST_ID,R.RATIO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_GENERATOR_B D ON R.DEV_ID=D.ID UNION ALL SELECT R.ID,R.DEV_ID,D.NAME,D.ST_ID,R.RATIO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_R_CONSTITUTE R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_CONVERTER_B D ON R.DEV_ID=D.ID ) r ON s.id=r.id where s.pg_id={0} AND s.id NOT IN ('04019901000018','04019901000017')
ROOT.GetSectionList0: select s.id,s.name,s.pg_id,yg.create_time,yg.v00 as value,sx.v00 as ulimit,xx.v00 as dlimit from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_b s left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SECTION_REALTIME_MEA yg on s.id=yg.section_id and yg.meas_type='00002001' left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SECTION_REALTIME_MEA sx on s.id=sx.section_id and sx.meas_type='00002020' and yg.create_time=sx.create_time left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SECTION_REALTIME_MEA xx on s.id=xx.section_id and xx.meas_type='00002021' and yg.create_time=xx.create_time where s.pg_id={0} or s.pg_id in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0} )
ROOT.GetSectionBList: SELECT ID,NAME,PG_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SECTION_B WHERE id NOT IN ('04019901000018','04019901000017')
